chunks.text:
<mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com> >; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | The Deal Kids – Dubai Outlet Mall 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of The Deal Kids – Dubai Outlet Mall will be on Friday 10th Jan 2025.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on Friday 10th Jan 2025 after trading hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out me at 050-4769298 at any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations 

Ramez Zebdie
